Posts.EditableText:
**I'm using Wine installed on a Chromebook, which for all intents and purposes is a Windows 10 machine**

So whenever I try and run the quest installer (quest580.exe), it runs flawlessly until I click install, at which point the program crashes. I'm not sure if this is an issue with Wine or with the installer itself. Can anyone help me with this?
Posts.HTML:
